TopicTitle: KSPedia: pressing F2 disables everything else but NOT KSPedia

Articles.Content:
So, the screen got a lot of UI elements from different mods, most at the borders.

Now I want to read something in the KSPedia, all these UI elements overlay the KSPedia - I can't read this way.

So I do something intuitive: I press F2.

But no avail, now also the whole KSPedia is hidden.

So please, pressing F2 should not hide the KSPedia.

The F2 button is intended to disable all UI related stuff, so that you can take 'clean' screenshots.  This should include the KSPedia.  I know I wouldn't want the KSPedia showing in my screenshots.....

Perhaps what might fill your need, without breaking the existing buttons functions, would be a new hotkey that disables all UI except KSPedia, or -gasp- perhaps SQUAD should just set the Z-ordering on KSPEdia to have it render in front of everything else (no hotkey needed...)
